tika-vin10t7:14: Chādentī bhikkhunī vajjaṃ, tisso āpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t7:15: Jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ, chādentī sā parājikā.
tika-vin10t7:26: Pūrentī aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ, tisso āpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t7:30: Pūrentī aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ, samaṇī sā parājitā.
tika-vin10t7:42: Ekā gāmantaraṃ gacche, gamane dukkaṭaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t7:49: Āpattīnaṃ pabhede tu, kāci natthi visesatā.
tika-vin10t7:60: ‘‘Sahatthena gahetvā tvaṃ, khāda vā bhuñja vā’’tipi;
tika-vin10t7:61: Uyyojentī panevaṃ tu, tisso āpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t7:67: Uyyojeti ca yā tassā, imā tissoti dīpaye.
tika-vin10t7:69: Sattame aṭṭhame cāpi, navame dasamepi ca;
tika-vin10t7:74: Ekaṃ nissaggiyaṃyeva, phuse pācittiyaṃ tu sā.
tika-vin10t7:77: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:80: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, chinne, tassā nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:82: Viññāpetvāva aññaṃ ce, viññāpeti tato paraṃ;
tika-vin10t7:85: Cetāpetvā hi aññaṃ ce, cetāpeti tato paraṃ;
tika-vin10t7:88: Evameva ca sesesu, chaṭṭhādīsu ca sattasu;
tika-vin10t7:92: Lasuṇaṃ khādati dve ce, dukkaṭaṃ gahaṇe siyā;
tika-vin10t7:95: Saṃharāpentiyā lomaṃ, sambādhe dveva honti hi;
tika-vin10t7:96: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, hoti pācitti saṃhaṭe.
tika-vin10t7:98: Karontī talaghātaṃ tu, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t7:99: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, kate pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:101: Jatunā maṭṭhakaṃ kiñci, sādiyantī duve phuse;
tika-vin10t7:108: Hatthapāse tu pācitti, hitvā tiṭṭhati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t7:113: Uccārādiṃ tirokuṭṭe, chaḍḍentī dve phuse have;
tika-vin10t7:114: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti chaḍḍite siyā.
tika-vin10t7:117: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassā, pācitti chaḍḍite siyā.
tika-vin10t7:123: Paṭhame dutiye ceva, tatiye ca catutthake;
tika-vin10t7:127: Sāmike tu anāpucchā, pakkamantī duve phuse.
tika-vin10t7:132: Sāmike tu anāpucchā, āsane ce nisīdati;
tika-vin10t7:133: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, pācitti ca nisīdite.
tika-vin10t7:135: Chaṭṭhena sattamaṃ sabbaṃ, samānaṃ aṭṭhame pana;
tika-vin10t7:141: Vadhitvā pana attānaṃ, rodantī tu duve phuse;
tika-vin10t7:142: Vadhati rodati pācitti, karotekaṃ tu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t7:145: Naggā nhāyati dve ceva, payoge dukkaṭaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t7:151: Cīvaraṃ tu visibbetvā, visibbāpetva vā pana;
tika-vin10t7:157: Sace saṅkamanīyaṃ tu, dhāreti pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t7:158: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti pana dhārite.
tika-vin10t7:161: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, kate pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:177: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tāsaṃ, nipanne itaraṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:180: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, kate pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:185: Sace upassayaṃ datvā, nikkaḍḍhati ca bhikkhuniṃ;
tika-vin10t7:186: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassā, hoti pācitti kaḍḍhite.
tika-vin10t7:188: Chaṭṭhe pana ca saṃsaṭṭhā, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t7:191: Antoraṭṭhe tu sāsaṅke, cārikaṃ tu carantiyā;
tika-vin10t7:199: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassā, pācitti yadi passati.
tika-vin10t7:202: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, bhutte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:204: Suttaṃ kantantiyā dveva, payoge dukkaṭaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t7:207: Veyyāvaccaṃ gihīnaṃ tu, dveva honti karontiyā;
tika-vin10t7:208: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, kate pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:211: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ chaṭṭhe, dinne pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:214: Aṭṭhamaṃ dutiye vagge, pañcamena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t7:217: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, pācitti hi pade pade.
tika-vin10t7:227: Dukkaṭaṃ piṭake vuttaṃ, pācitti dutiyena tu.
tika-vin10t7:229: Akkosati ca yā bhikkhuṃ, bhikkhunī paribhāsati;
tika-vin10t7:232: Yā hi caṇḍikabhāvena, gaṇaṃ tu paribhāsati;
tika-vin10t7:236: Bhuñjantī bhikkhunī sā hi, dve panāpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t7:241: Kulaṃ tu maccharāyantī, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t7:242: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, sesā maccharite siyā.
tika-vin10t7:250: Ovādatthāya vā bhikkhuṃ, saṃvāsatthāya vā tathā;
tika-vin10t7:251: Na gacchati sace tassā, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:253: Ovādampi na yācantī, na gacchantī uposathaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:260: Gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhapentī hi, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t7:277: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, pacchā, hoti pācitti khīyite.
tika-vin10t7:279: Sattame aṭṭhame ceva, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t7:284: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, hoti pācitti dhārite.
tika-vin10t7:286: Yānena pana yāyantī, dve kirāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t7:287: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, pācitti yadi yāyite.
tika-vin10t7:289: Dhārentiyā tu saṅghāṇiṃ, payoge dukkaṭaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t7:290: Dhārite pana pācitti, catutthepi ayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t7:296: Sattame aṭṭhame ceva, navame dasamepi ca.
tika-vin10t7:301: Anāpucchā tu bhikkhussa, purato yā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t7:302: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassā, pācitti tu nisīdite.
tika-vin10t7:305: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, vuttā pācitti pucchite.
tika-vin10t7:315: Tato bhikkhuniyā tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:334: Jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ, sace chādeti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t7:335: Cutā, thullaccayaṃ hoti, sace vematikā siyā.
tika-vin10t7:337: Pācitti bhikkhu saṅghādi-sesaṃ chādeti ce pana;
tika-vin10t7:338: Attano pana duṭṭhullaṃ, chādento dukkaṭaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t7:349: Accajaṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t7:362: Bhikkhunī tu sace hoti, pāṭidesaniyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:364: Ājīvahetu sūpaṃ vā, odanaṃ vā panattano;
tika-vin10t7:387: Jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ, sace chādeti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t7:388: Cutā, thullaccayaṃ hoti, sace vematikā siyā.
tika-vin10t7:390: Pācitti bhikkhu saṅghādi-sesaṃ chādeti ce pana;
tika-vin10t7:399: Thullaccayaṃ dvayaṃ dvīhi, kammavācāhi sā phuse;
tika-vin10t7:403: Na pariccajati taṃ laddhiṃ, hoti saṅghādisesatā.
tika-vin10t7:413: Khandhake paṭhame tāva, kati āpattiyo siyuṃ?
tika-vin10t7:414: Khandhake paṭhame tāva, dve panāpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t7:417: Hoti pācittiyaṃ tassa, sesesu pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t7:428: Hoti pācittiyaṃ tassa, sesesu pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t7:433: Kati āpattiyo vuttā, khandhake tu pavāraṇe?
tika-vin10t7:436: Kati āpattiyo vuttā, camme? Tissova dīpitā;
tika-vin10t7:437: Mārentānaṃ tu pācitti, gahetvā vacchatariṃ pana.
tika-vin10t7:440: Tassa thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, sesesu pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t7:448: Kathine natthi āpatti, paññattaṃ kevalaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t7:463: Chandassa dāyako bhikkhu, pācitti yadi khīyati;
tika-vin10t7:469: Attano aṅgajātaṃ tu, chindaṃ thullaccayaṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t7:470: Romanthe hoti pācitti, sese āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t7:472: Tathā senāsanasmiṃ tu, tisso āpattiyo siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t7:506: Tesu ekena vā dvīhi, tīhi vātha catūhi vā;
tika-vin10t7:509: Tattha pañcasamuṭṭhānā, kā cāpatti na vijjati;
tika-vin10t7:519: Pacchimehi ca tīheva, samuṭṭhāti na aññato.
tika-vin10t7:543: Tattha yā tu catutthena, samuṭṭhānena jāyate;
tika-vin10t7:582: Paṭhamaṃ dutiyaṃ tattha, catutthaṃ navamampi ca;
tika-vin10t7:589: Sabhojane, raho dve ca, aṅgulī, udake hasaṃ.
tika-vin10t7:591: Pahāre, uggire ceva, tepaññāsā ca sekhiyā;
tika-vin10t7:613: Ukkoṭanaṃ =00 tathā ūno, saṃvāso, nāsanena ca;
tika-vin10t7:617: Kiṃ te, akālaṃ, acchinde, duggahā, nirayena vā.
tika-vin10t7:619: Gaṇassa ca vibhaṅgañca, dubbalāsā tatheva ca;
tika-vin10t7:622: Sayaṃ upassayaṃ datvā, akkoseyya ca caṇḍikā;
tika-vin10t7:625: Pāyantiṃ, dve ca vassāni, saṅghenāsammatampi ca;
tika-vin10t7:628: Ūnadvādasavassā dve, tathālaṃ tāva teti ca;
tika-vin10t7:647: Pūvehi, paccayo jotiṃ, ratanaṃ, sūci, mañcakaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:648: Tūlaṃ, nisīdanaṃ, kaṇḍu, vassikā, sugatassa ca.
tika-vin10t7:651: Saṅghikena duve vuttā, dve mahājanikena ca.
tika-vin10t7:663: Appasaddā duve vuttā, tathā na byāhareti ca;
tika-vin10t7:664: Chamā, nīcāsane, ṭhānaṃ, pacchato, uppathena ca.
tika-vin10t7:667: Paccakkhāmīti sikkhā ca, tathā kismiñcideva ca.
tika-vin10t7:669: Saṃsaṭṭhā dve, vadhitvā ca, visibbetvā ca dukkhitaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:670: Punadeva ca saṃsaṭṭhā, neva vūpasameyya ca.
tika-vin10t7:675: Sace me cīvaraṃ ayye, anubandhissasīti ca;
tika-vin10t7:682: Kathināni ca tīṇādi, patto, bhesajjameva ca;
tika-vin10t7:705: Naggaṃ, attharaṇaṃ, mañce, antoraṭṭhe, tathā bahi.
tika-vin10t7:708: Veyyāvaccaṃ, sahatthā ca, āvāse ca abhikkhuke.
tika-vin10t7:720: Sabbe cha panime dhammā, vācato vācacittato;
tika-vin10t7:727: Etā =03 catusamuṭṭhānā, sikkhā cuddasa honti hi;
tika-vin10t7:732: Paṭicchanne ca okāse, byūhe cāti ime chapi.
tika-vin10t7:751: Pañca āpattiyo honti, kuṭiṃ saṃyācikāya tu.
tika-vin10t7:759: Kati =04 āpattiyo honti, dutiyena tuvaṃ bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t7:763: Karonti ce kuṭiṃ tassa, vipannaṃ sabbathā pana.
tika-vin10t7:768: Tatiyena kati jāyanti, samuṭṭhānena me bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t7:779: Siyuṃ kati catutthena, samuṭṭhānena me bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t7:782: Hoti pārājikaṃ tassa, kuṭiṃ saṃyācikāya tu;
tika-vin10t7:788: Kati āpattiyo honti, pañcamena? Cha honti hi;
tika-vin10t7:796: Vāceti padaso dhammaṃ, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t7:800: Cha ca saṃvidahitvāna, bhaṇḍaṃ harati ce cuto.
tika-vin10t7:820: Kā panāpattiyo nāma, lahukā garukāpi kā?
tika-vin10t7:823: Duṭṭhullā nāma kāpatti, aduṭṭhullāpi nāma kā?
tika-vin10t7:825: Niyatā nāma kāpatti, kā panāniyatāpi ca?
tika-vin10t7:850: Bhikkhū ca bhabbā atha bhikkhunī ca.
tika-vin10t7:875: Kathañhi =07 bhaṇato saccaṃ, garukaṃ hoti bhikkhuno?
tika-vin10t7:881: Kathaṃ musā bhaṇantassa, garukaṃ hoti bhikkhuno?
tika-vin10t7:882: Kathañca bhaṇato saccaṃ, āpatti lahukā siyā?
tika-vin10t7:887: Kathaṃ bhūmigato dosaṃ, na vehāsagato phuse?
tika-vin10t7:888: Kathaṃ vehāsago dosaṃ, na ca bhūmigato phuse?
tika-vin10t7:896: Pavisanto kathaṃ bhikkhu, āpajjati, na nikkhamaṃ?
tika-vin10t7:897: Pavisanto kathaṃ bhikkhu, pavisanto na ceva taṃ?
tika-vin10t7:903: Nikkhamantova āpattiṃ, phuseyya, pavisaṃ na ca.
tika-vin10t7:912: Yevaṃ anādiyantova, āpajjati hi nāma so.
tika-vin10t7:918: Samādiyanto āpattiṃ, āpajjati hi nāma so.
tika-vin10t7:920: Yo hi kammakato bhikkhu, vuttaṃ vattaṃ panattano;
tika-vin10t7:924: Na karonto kathaṃ nāma, samaṇo dosavā siyā?
tika-vin10t7:930: Akaronto panāpattiṃ, āpajjati hi nāma so.
tika-vin10t7:932: Dento āpajjatāpattiṃ, na dentopi kathaṃ bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t7:933: Aññātikāya yaṃ kiñci, bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā pana.
tika-vin10t7:935: Cīvaraṃ dadamāno hi, dento āpajjate pana;
tika-vin10t7:945: Ovādañca na gaṇhanto, āpajjati hi vajjataṃ.
tika-vin10t7:950: Yo hi nissaggiyaṃ vatthuṃ, accajitvā nisevati;
tika-vin10t7:951: Ayaṃ tu paribhogena, āpajjati, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t7:954: Ayaṃ tu paribhogena, āpajjati hi bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t7:956: Divāpajjati no rattiṃ, rattimeva ca no divā;
tika-vin10t7:959: Sagāraseyyakaṃ =09 rattiṃ, āpajjati hi no divā;
tika-vin10t7:971: Na chindanto nakhe kese, āpajjati hi nāma so;
tika-vin10t7:977: Āpajjati hi dhārento, na dhārento kathaṃ pana?
tika-vin10t7:984: Atthāpatti hi tiṭṭhante, nāthe, no parinibbute;
tika-vin10t7:990: Āpattiyo imā dvepi, ṭhapetvā sugate pana;
tika-vin10t7:993: Kāleyeva siyāpatti, vikāle na siyā kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t7:994: Vikāle tu siyāpatti, na kāle, ubhayatthapi?
tika-vin10t7:1000: Sabbaṃ kāle vikāle ca, natthi tattha ca saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t7:1002: Rattimeva panāpattiṃ, āpajjati ca no divā;
tika-vin10t7:1006: Divā, sesā panāpatti, siyā rattiṃ divāpi ca.
tika-vin10t7:1008: Dasavasso tu no ūna-dasavasso siyā kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t7:1012: Āpattiṃ pana abyatto, āpajjati, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t7:1017: Kāḷe āpajjatāpattiṃ, na juṇhe juṇhake kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:1020: Vassaṃ anupagacchanto, kāḷe, no juṇhake pana;
tika-vin10t7:1024: Kāḷe ceva ca juṇhe ca, āpajjati, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t7:1026: Vassūpagamanaṃ kāḷe, no juṇhe, tu pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t7:1027: Juṇhe kappati, no kāḷe, sesaṃ panubhayatthapi.
tika-vin10t7:1030: Gimheyeva na sesesu, vasse no itaradvaye.
tika-vin10t7:1035: Āpajjati ca hemante, nivāseti ca taṃ sace;
tika-vin10t7:1047: Ovassāpeti yo kāyaṃ, vasse āpajjatīdha so.
tika-vin10t7:1049: Āpajjati hi saṅghova, na gaṇo na ca puggalo;
tika-vin10t7:1050: Gaṇova na ca sesā hi, puggalova na cāpare.
tika-vin10t7:1053: Saṅgho vāpajjatāpattiṃ, na gaṇo na ca puggalo.
tika-vin10t7:1056: Gaṇo vāpajjatāpattiṃ, na saṅgho na ca puggalo.
tika-vin10t7:1058: Suttuddesaṃ karonto vā, eko pana uposathaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:1059: Puggalopajjatāpattiṃ, na ca saṅgho gaṇo na ca.
tika-vin10t7:1064: Bhesajjena panaññena, atthe sati ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t7:1067: Na bhesajjena atthepi, bhesajjaṃ viññāpeti ce;
tika-vin10t7:1070: Atthāpatti hi antova, na bahiddhā, tathā bahi;
tika-vin10t7:1073: Anupakhajja seyyaṃ tu, kappento pana kevalaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:1074: Āpajjati panāpattiṃ, antoyeva ca, no bahi.
tika-vin10t7:1077: Bahiyeva ca, no anto, sesaṃ panubhayatthapi.
tika-vin10t7:1132: Āpanno paṭibuddhova, sutto sujjhati so kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t7:1138: Desento pana taṃ ñatvā, paṭibuddho visujjhati.
tika-vin10t7:1141: Samathe tu sayantova, sutto vuṭṭhāti nāma so.
tika-vin10t7:1147: Desento pana taṃ pacchā, paṭibuddho visujjhati.
tika-vin10t7:1156: Pacchā taṃ pana desento, sacittova visujjhati.
tika-vin10t7:1171: Desento pana taṃ pacchā, akammena visujjhati.
tika-vin10t7:1180: Desento pana taṃ pacchā, akammeneva sujjhati.
tika-vin10t7:1189: Vuṭṭhānakāle saṅghena, kiñci kammaṃ na vijjati.
tika-vin10t7:1198: Taṃ pacchā pana desento, visujjhati asammukhā.
tika-vin10t7:1213: Atthāpatti ca sesaṃ tu, ubho nāpajjare pana.
tika-vin10t7:1216: Vihāraṃ pavisanto ca, vicarantopi tattha ca.
tika-vin10t7:1233: Samaṇo samaṇī kāya-saṃsaggaṃ tu karonti ce;
tika-vin10t7:1237: Kāyassa pana saṃsaggo, ubhinnaṃ vatthu hoti hi.
tika-vin10t7:1240: Āpajjati hi pācittiṃ, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t7:1278: Upajjhāyo phuse vajjaṃ, na ca saddhivihāriko.
tika-vin10t7:1283: Sesaṃ panidha āpattiṃ, āpajjanti ubhopi ca;
tika-vin10t7:1286: Ādiyanto garuṃ dosaṃ, payojento lahuṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t7:1287: Ādiyanto lahuṃ dosaṃ, payojento garuṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t7:1292: Pādaṃ vāpi tato uddhaṃ, ādiyanto garuṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t7:1298: Kāleyeva panāpatti, no vikāle kathaṃ siyā?
tika-vin10t7:1299: Vikāleyeva āpatti, na ca kāle kathaṃ siyā?
tika-vin10t7:1301: Atthāpatti hi kāle ca, vikāle ca pakāsitā?
tika-vin10t7:1302: Neva kāle vikāle ca, atthāpatti pakāsitā?
tika-vin10t7:1308: Sesaṃ kāle vikāle ca, āpajjati, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t7:1313: Kiṃ paṭiggahitaṃ kāle, no vikāle tu kappati?
tika-vin10t7:1314: Vikāle kiñca no kāle, gahitaṃ pana kappati?
tika-vin10t7:1316: Kāle ceva vikāle ca, kiṃ nāma vada kappati?
tika-vin10t7:1317: Neva kāle ca kiṃ nāma, no vikāle ca kappati?
tika-vin10t7:1320: Kāleyeva tu bhikkhūnaṃ, no vikāle tu kappati.
tika-vin10t7:1323: Vikāleyeva kāle ca, aparajju na kappati.
tika-vin10t7:1326: Kāle ceva vikāle ca, kappatīti viniddise.
tika-vin10t7:1332: Kāle ceva vikāle ca, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t7:1335: Majjhime pana desasmiṃ, na ca paccantimesu hi.
tika-vin10t7:1340: Sīmaṃ samudde bandhanto, bhikkhu paccantimesu hi;
tika-vin10t7:1346: Dhārento majjhime vajjaṃ, phuse paccantimesu no;
tika-vin10t7:1350: Paccantimesu vā bhikkhu, nāpajjati na majjhime.
tika-vin10t7:1352: Paccantimesu desesu, kappate na ca majjhime;
tika-vin10t7:1353: Kappate, majjhime dese, no ca paccantimesu hi.
tika-vin10t7:1356: Paccantimesu cevāpi, kiṃ na kappati majjhime?
tika-vin10t7:1359: Niddise kappatī ceva, na ca kappati majjhime.
tika-vin10t7:1364: Paccantimesu desesu, evaṃ vuttaṃ na kappati;
tika-vin10t7:1368: Ubhayatthapi taṃ sabbaṃ, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t7:1370: Anto āpajjatāpattiṃ, āpajjati ca, no bahi;
tika-vin10t7:1371: Bahi āpajjatāpattiṃ, na ca anto kudācanaṃ.
tika-vin10t7:1374: Neva anto ca āpattiṃ, āpajjati ca, no bahi.
tika-vin10t7:1377: Saṅghikaṃ pana mañcādiṃ, ajjhokāse tu kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t7:1379: Nikkhipitvāna gacchanto, no anto, bahiyeva ca;
tika-vin10t7:1385: Gāme āpajjatāpattiṃ, no araññe kathaṃ vada?
tika-vin10t7:1386: Āpajjati araññasmiṃ, na ca gāme kathaṃ vada?
tika-vin10t7:1388: Āpajjati ca gāmepi, araññepi kathaṃ vada?
tika-vin10t7:1389: Nevāpajjati gāmepi, no araññe kathaṃ vada?
tika-vin10t7:1392: Āpajjati hi taṃ bhikkhu, gāmasmiṃ, no araññake.
tika-vin10t7:1394: Agaṇā aruṇaṃ nāma, uṭṭhāpentī ca bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t7:1395: Āpajjati panāpattiṃ, araññe, no ca gāmake.
tika-vin10t7:1401: Agilānova āpattiṃ, phuse, no ca gilānako.
tika-vin10t7:1403: Agilāno gilāno ca, āpajjanti ubhopi ca;
tika-vin10t7:1404: Nāpajjanti gilāno ca, agilāno ubhopi ca.
tika-vin10t7:1406: Bhesajjena panaññena, atthe sati ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t7:1409: Na bhesajjena atthepi, bhesajjaṃ viññāpeti ce;
tika-vin10t7:1422: Yo tattha cīvaruppādo, so ca nesaṃ bhavissati;
tika-vin10t7:1429: Gadrabhassa vasā ceti, vasā pañcavidhā matā.
tika-vin10t7:1472: Āpattiṃ pana jānāti, anāpattiṃ garuṃ lahuṃ.
tika-vin10t7:1481: Satta sāmīciyo vuttā, satteva samathāpi ca;
tika-vin10t7:1486: Pupphena ca phalenāpi, cuṇṇenapi ca dūsako.
tika-vin10t7:1494: Kataṃ ahatthapāsepi, na ca bhuttāvinā kataṃ;
tika-vin10t7:1507: Iti aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti, sabbameva ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t7:1524: Musā na bhāse, na ca majjapo siyā;
tika-vin10t7:1528: Mālaṃ na dhāre, na ca gandhamācare;
tika-vin10t7:1538: Dukkaṭaṃ pana niddiṭṭhaṃ, nava maṃsāni khādato.
tika-vin10t7:1545: Akappiyāni maṃsāni, dasa sukkāni ve dasa.
tika-vin10t7:1547: Jāti nāmañca gottañca, kammaṃ sippañca rogatā;
tika-vin10t7:1548: Liṅgāpatti kilesā ca, akkosena daseva hi.
tika-vin10t7:1553: Dasa kammapathā puññā, apuññāpi tathā dasa;
tika-vin10t7:1575: Pattā akappiyā vuttā, ekādasa bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t7:1588: Gaṇṭhikā kappiyā vuttā, ekādasa ca vīdhakā.
tika-vin10t7:1599: Aṭṭha saṅghādisesesu, ubhinnaṃ tu vasā pana;
tika-vin10t7:1612: Niruttaro bhavati hi so, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t7:1616: Ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi, bhikkhūnaṃ suṇataṃ puna;
tika-vin10t7:1620: Paṭicca methunaṃ dhammaṃ, kathaṃ pārājiko siyā?
tika-vin10t7:1623: Mukhena methunaṃ dhammaṃ, katvā pārājiko bhave.
tika-vin10t7:1625: Suññe nissattake dīpe, eko bhikkhu sace vase;
tika-vin10t7:1628: Lambī vā mudupiṭṭhī vā, vaccamagge mukhepi vā;
tika-vin10t7:1631: Sayaṃ nādiyate kiñci, parañca na samādape;
tika-vin10t7:1638: Parassa tu parikkhāraṃ, na ca pārājiko kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t7:1641: Gaṇhanto theyyacittena, na ca pārājiko siyā.
tika-vin10t7:1643: Attano santakaṃ datvā, bhikkhu pārājiko kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t7:1646: Pitari pitusaññī ca, mātusaññī ca mātari;
tika-vin10t7:1647: Hantvānantariyaṃ kammaṃ, na phuseyya kathaṃ naro?
tika-vin10t7:1653: Gacchaṃ ṭhito nisinno vā, kathaṃ pārājiko bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t7:1659: Kathaṃ? Kathehi me puṭṭho, vinaye ce visārado.
tika-vin10t7:1665: Acaritvā yathāvuttaṃ, vattaṃ so vuṭṭhito kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t7:1675: Vaṇṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne yo, titthiyānaṃ tu kujjhati;
tika-vin10t7:1678: Atthaṅgate tu sūriye, bhojanaṃ bhikkhu bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t7:1681: Yo ca romanthayitvāna, rattiṃ ghasati bhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:1684: Atthaṅgate ca sūriye, gahetvā bhikkhu bhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:1685: Sace bhuñjeyya āpatti, anāpatti kathaṃ bhave?
tika-vin10t7:1688: Āgantvā idha kālena, natthi āpatti bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t7:1690: Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, yaṃ paresaṃ mamāyitaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:1691: Na harantova taṃ theyyā, kathaṃ pārājiko siyā?
tika-vin10t7:1696: Nārī rūpavatī bālā, bhikkhu rattena cetasā;
tika-vin10t7:1697: Methunaṃ tāya katvāpi, so na pārājiko kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t7:1702: Ekissā dve siyuṃ puttā, jātā idha panitthiyā;
tika-vin10t7:1703: Dvinnaṃ mātā pitā sāva, kathaṃ hoti bhaṇāhi me?
tika-vin10t7:1706: Gaṇhāpeti paraṃ gabbhaṃ, tasmā mātā pitā ca sā.
tika-vin10t7:1712: Dārakassa ca mātā hi, kātuṃ labhati bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t7:1714: Ko ca bhikkhūhi sikkhāsu, asādhāraṇataṃ gato;
tika-vin10t7:1715: Na pārivāsiko brūhi, na ukkhittādikopi ca?
tika-vin10t7:1718: Na so labhati aññesaṃ, kappatīti ca niddise.
tika-vin10t7:1721: Katamo puggalo brūhi, na mato na ca jīvati?
tika-vin10t7:1724: Hoti nimmitabuddho so, na mato na ca jīvati.
tika-vin10t7:1729: Naro karoti ce kuṭiṃ, sa sabbamattikāmayaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:1730: Na muccateva vajjato, jinena vuttato tato.
tika-vin10t7:1743: Parassā pana yā vajjaṃ, paṭicchādeti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t7:1751: Abhabbā pana ye vuttā, puggalā paṇḍakādayo;
tika-vin10t7:1754: Anuggiraṃ giraṃ kiñci, subhaṃ vā yadi vāsubhaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:1755: Phuse vācasikaṃ vajjaṃ, kathaṃ me pucchito bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t7:1769: Saṃvidhāya ca cattāro, garuṃ theniṃsu bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:1770: Thero thullaccayaṃ tesu, patto, sesā parājayaṃ.
tika-vin10t7:1772: Kathaṃ ? Chamāsakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, tattha sāhatthikā tayo;
tika-vin10t7:1773: Haṭā therena māsā tu, tayo āṇattiyāpi ca.
tika-vin10t7:1780: Bahiddhā gehato bhikkhu, itthī gabbhantaraṃ gatā;
tika-vin10t7:1781: Chiddaṃ gehassa no atthi, methunapaccayā cuto.
tika-vin10t7:1786: Sappiādiṃ tu bhesajjaṃ, gahetvā sāmameva taṃ;
tika-vin10t7:1793: Ekatova kathaṃ bhikkhu, āpajjeyya bhaṇāhi me?
tika-vin10t7:1795: Saṅghe pariṇataṃ lābhaṃ, attano ca parassa ca;
tika-vin10t7:1809: Nissaggiyāni sabbāni, kathaṃ honti kathehi me?
tika-vin10t7:1811: Kaṇṇaṃ gahetvā tattheva, kaddamaṃ yadi dhovati;
tika-vin10t7:1814: Purisaṃ apitaraṃ hantvā, itthiṃ hantvā amātaraṃ;
tika-vin10t7:1817: Parivatte tu liṅgasmiṃ, pitaraṃ itthitaṃ gataṃ;
tika-vin10t7:1818: Mātaraṃ purisattaṃ tu, gataṃ hantvā garuṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t7:1820: Mātaraṃ pana māretvā, māretvā pitarampi ca;
tika-vin10t7:1826: Codetvā sammukhībhūtaṃ, saṅgho kammaṃ kareyya ce;
tika-vin10t7:1827: Kathaṃ kammaṃ akammaṃ taṃ, saṅgho sāpattiko siyā?
tika-vin10t7:1841: Bhesajjāni hi pañceva, gahetvā bhājane visuṃ;
tika-vin10t7:1856: Anāpatti hi so rukkho, hoti ekakulassa ce.
tika-vin10t7:1863: Nānitthīnaṃ tu kese vā, tāsaṃ aṅguliyopi vā;
tika-vin10t7:1864: Ekato gahaṇe tassa, honti sambahulā pana.
tika-vin10t7:1875: Methunaṃ na ca sevanto, methunappaccayā cuto?
tika-vin10t7:1880: Mātaraṃ cīvaraṃ yāce, saṅghe pariṇataṃ na ca;
tika-vin10t7:1881: Kenassa hoti āpatti, anāpatti ca ñātake?
tika-vin10t7:1897: Ekassa kammaṃ tu na rūhate kiṃ?
tika-vin10t7:1904: Saṅghenapi hi ākāse, ṭhitena pana iddhiyā;
tika-vin10t7:1905: Bhūmigassa na kātabbaṃ, karoti yadi kuppati.
tika-vin10t7:1907: Na ca kappakataṃ vatthaṃ, na ca rattaṃ akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:1911: Na cassākappiyaṃ nāma, cīvaraṃ pana vijjati.
tika-vin10t7:1913: Na kutopi ca gaṇhati kiñci have;
tika-vin10t7:1914: Na tu deti ca kiñcipi bhojanato;
tika-vin10t7:1932: Chādeti, na phuse vajjaṃ, kathaṃ jānāsi me vada?
tika-vin10t7:1938: Dvijaṃ kantamakantañca, sace jānāsi me vada?
tika-vin10t7:1958: Nidānaṃ nāma vesālī, tathā rājagahaṃ puraṃ;
tika-vin10t7:1961: Kati vesāliyā vuttā, kati rājagahe katā?
tika-vin10t7:1965: Kati bhaggesu paññattā, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito?
tika-vin10t7:1970: Cha panāḷaviyaṃ vuttā, aṭṭha kosambiyaṃ katā;
tika-vin10t7:1971: Aṭṭha sakkesu paññattā, tayo bhaggesu dīpitā.
tika-vin10t7:1977: Bhikkhunīsu ca akkoso, dasa vesāliyaṃ katā.
tika-vin10t7:1988: Vosāsantī ca naccaṃ vā, gītaṃ vā cārikadvayaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:2001: Ovādopi ca bhesajjaṃ, sūci āraññakesu ca.
tika-vin10t7:2013: Daseva pana gārayhā, dvesattati ca sekhiyā.
tika-vin10t7:2016: Ime vuttāvasesā hi, sabbe sāvatthiyaṃ katā.
tika-vin10t7:2021: Dve gārayhā, tayo sekhā, chappaññāseva sabbaso;
tika-vin10t7:2022: Bhavanti chasu paññattā, nagaresu ca piṇḍitā.
tika-vin10t7:2027: Sikkhāpadāni bhikkhūnaṃ, vīsañca dve satāni ca;
tika-vin10t7:2028: Bhikkhunīnaṃ tu cattāri, tathā tīṇi satāni ca.
tika-vin10t7:2031: Aniyatā duve vuttā, tiṃsa nissaggiyāni ca.
tika-vin10t7:2033: Khuddakā navuti dve ca, cattāro pāṭidesanā;
tika-vin10t7:2036: Dve satāni ca vīsañca, vasā bhikkhūnameva ca;
tika-vin10t7:2039: Pārājikāni aṭṭheva, garukā dasa satta ca;
tika-vin10t7:2040: Nissaggiyāni tiṃseva, chasaṭṭhi ca satampi ca.
tika-vin10t7:2043: Sabbāni pana cattāri, tathā tīṇi satāni ca.
tika-vin10t7:2045: Bhavanti pana etāni, bhikkhunīnaṃ vasā pana;
tika-vin10t7:2051: Cha ca saṅghādisesā ca, tathā aniyatā duve;
tika-vin10t7:2052: Dvādaseva ca nissaggā, dvāvīsati ca khuddakā.
tika-vin10t7:2058: Kuṭi ceva vihāro ca, chaḷete garukā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t7:2063: Tatiyepi ca vaggasmiṃ, patto ca paṭhamo tathā;
tika-vin10t7:2084: Bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīnañca, sataṃ tiṃsa bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t7:2088: Dvādaseva ca nissaggā, khuddakā navuticcha ca.
tika-vin10t7:2090: Aṭṭheva pana gārayhā, sataṃ tiṃsa bhavantime;
tika-vin10t7:2106: Ekatoyeva paññattā, sataṃ tiṃsa bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t7:2109: Pārājikāni cattāri, garukā ca dasaccha ca.
tika-vin10t7:2114: Dvādaseva ca gārayhā, sataṃ sattati caccha ca;
tika-vin10t7:2128: Ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi, lakkhaṇaṃ pana sabbagaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:2129: Savane sādaraṃ katvā, vadato me nibodhatha.
tika-vin10t7:2140: Puggalo nāma yaṃ yaṃ tu, bhikkhumārabbha bhikkhuniṃ;
tika-vin10t7:2141: Sikkhāpadaṃ tu paññattaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo.
tika-vin10t7:2147: Thullanandādayo satta, sabbe tiṃsa bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t7:2149: Vatthūti puggalasseva, tassa tassa ca sabbaso;
tika-vin10t7:2152: Kevalā pana paññatti, mūlabhūtā tatheva sā;
tika-vin10t7:2177: Āṇattīti ca nāmesā, ñeyyā āṇāpanā pana.
tika-vin10t7:2182: Kāyenapi ca vācāya, yā karontassa jāyate;
tika-vin10t7:2191: Siyā pana karontassa, akarontassa yā siyā;
tika-vin10t7:2208: Puna sabbāva cittassa, vasena duvidhā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t7:2219: Yassā sacittake pakkhe, cittaṃ akusalaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t7:2259: Dve panāpattimūlāni, kāyo vācā bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t7:2262: Kati gāmantare vuttā, nadīpāre tathā kati?
tika-vin10t7:2263: Kati thullaccayaṃ maṃse, kati maṃsesu dukkaṭaṃ?
tika-vin10t7:2268: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, saṃvidhāti ca dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:2274: Tathā bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, saṃvidhāne tu dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:2275: Abhirūhati nāvaṃ ce, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t7:2278: Paṭhame, dutiye tassā, hoti bhikkhuniyā garuṃ.
tika-vin10t7:2280: Kati vācasikā rattiṃ, kati vācasikā divā?
tika-vin10t7:2281: Duve vācasikā rattiṃ, duve vācasikā divā.
tika-vin10t7:2293: Kati vā dadamānassa, kati vā paṭigaṇhato?
tika-vin10t7:2296: Manussassa visaṃ deti, sace marati tena so;
tika-vin10t7:2297: Hoti pārājikaṃ, yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t7:2300: Tathā pācitti aññāti-kāya ce deti cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin10t7:2314: Kati dhaññarasā vuttā, vikāle kappiyā pana?
tika-vin10t7:2318: Ratticchedo katīnaṃ tu, paññattā dvaṅgulā kati?
tika-vin10t7:2321: Ratticchedo duvinnaṃ tu, paññattā dvaṅgulā duve.
tika-vin10t7:2324: Pārājikāni kāyamhā, ime dve pana jāyare.
tika-vin10t7:2335: Dvaṅgulaṃ vā dumāsaṃ vā, paññattā dvaṅgulā duve.
tika-vin10t7:2338: Kati obhāsane vuttā, sañcaritte tathā kati?
tika-vin10t7:2346: Pārājikaṃ siyā, yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṃ mate.
tika-vin10t7:2358: Dukkaṭaṃ pana niddiṭṭhaṃ, tisso obhāsanā yimā.
tika-vin10t7:2361: Dvīhi thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, ekena pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t7:2367: Bhūtagāmaṃ tu pācitti, aṅgajātaṃ tu thullatā.
tika-vin10t7:2369: Visaṃ chaḍḍetyanodissa, manusso marati tena ce;
tika-vin10t7:2370: Pārājikaṃ, mate yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:2375: Gacchato katidhāpatti, ṭhitassa kati me vada?
tika-vin10t7:2381: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, saṃvidhāne tu dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t7:2388: Posassa hatthapāse tu, pācitti yadi tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t7:2394: Hitvā tiṭṭhati ce tassā, hoti saṅghādisesatā.
tika-vin10t7:2405: Anissagge tu pācitti, pāpikāya ca diṭṭhiyā;
tika-vin10t7:2415: Gahetvā bhojanaṃ kiñci, sabbaṃ maṃsaṃ akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t7:2427: Olokentassa vā vuttaṃ, mukhaṃ bhikkhaṃ dadantiyā.
tika-vin10t7:2438: Mettiyā dūsako ceva, kaṇṭakoti tayo ime;
tika-vin10t7:2442: Dve tayo anusāvetuṃ, vaṭṭatīti ca niddise.
tika-vin10t7:2444: Ñattiyā kappanā ceva, tathā vippakatampi ca;
tika-vin10t7:2454: Kāraṇehi pana dvīhi, saṅgho bhijjati, naññathā.
tika-vin10t7:2466: Yo te vasati ārāme, vadaṃ thullaccayaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t7:2468: Viññāpetvā paṇītaṃ tu, bhojanaṃ bhikkhu bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t7:2471: Viññāpetvāna sūpaṃ vā, odanaṃ vā anāmayo;
tika-vin10t7:2472: Bhikkhu bhuñjati ce tassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t7:2487: Bhavanti pana sabbāni, aḍḍhuḍḍhāni satāni hi.
tika-vin10t7:2497: Atthe akkharabandhe vā, viññāsassa kamepi vā;
tika-vin10t7:2498: Kaṅkhā tasmā na kātabbā, kātabbā bahumānatā.
tika-vin10t7:2509: Vāceti ca paraṃ niccaṃ, atthaṃ upaparikkhati.
tika-vin10t7:2511: Yo tassa pana bhikkhussa, atthā vinayanissitā;
tika-vin10t7:2537: Rājā pātu mahiṃ sammā, kāle devo pavassatu.
tika-vin10t7:2539: Yāva tiṭṭhati selindo, yāva cando virocati;
tika-vin10t7:2551: Akāsiṃ paramaṃ etaṃ, uttaraṃ nāma nāmato;
tika-vin10t7:2552: Savane sādaraṃ katvā, sikkhitabbo tato ayaṃ.
tika-vin10t7:2559: Iti tambapaṇṇiyena paramaveyyākaraṇena tipiṭakanayavidhikusalena paramakavijanahadayapadumavanavikasanakarena kavivaravasabhena paramaratikaravaramadhuravacanuggārena uragapurena buddhadattena racito uttaravinicchayo samattoti.
